short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn English words with images & sound in 3 fun interactive modes with this Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your English language skills with this Chrome extension. As you browse the web, our extension scans the page for English words and replaces them with images and sound. With three different modes to choose from, you can customize your learning experience to suit your needs. In the first mode, hovering over a word will display an image associated with the word over the word. In the second mode, all words on the page will be replaced with images. The third mode, when you click on a word, it will play the sound of the word and the word will be replaced with an image. With our extension, you can learn English in a fun and interactive way, no matter where you are on the web. The extension is designed with ease of use in mind and it can be easily customized to suit your specific needs. It's a perfect tool for students, teachers, and anyone looking to improve their English language skills. Try it out now and see the difference for yourself!
